name: Gun On The Dungefloor
description:
Shoot on the beat to kill the enemies in a procedural generated dungeon while firing against mercenaries, bombermen, aliens and gunslingers!

Play with a keyboard or a controller!

Controls (Keyboard / Controller):

WASD / Left Analog - Movement
Left Mouse / Right trigger - Shoot
Right Mouse / Y button - Dash
I / View button - Open Map
ESC / Menu button - Pause Menu

Minimum system requirements:
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i3-2130 or equivalent
Memory:  8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD R9 270 
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 1 GB

Recommended system requirements:
OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 
CPU: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon RX 580
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 1 GB
